title: Ryanair’s top travel destination for 2026 has £2.52 beers & unusual UFO tower
description: WHILE Ryanair has been axing flights across Europe for months, there are some destinations where the airline is upping its flight capacity. And one of those cities is also one of the airline's top places to travel in 2026 which has a charming Old Town, huge castles and cheap drinks. The budget airline has named...

title: Seer Claims Enormous UFO Will Descend On Earth This Year As World Watches Nervously
description: Claims that a massive UFO might approach Earth in 2026, driven by revived prophecies and modern psychic predictions, are fuelling global debate. Scientific experts stress there is no evidence to support these assertions.

title: The R.A.D. UFO Is Out of this World Comfortable
description: This super trainer from the CrossFit-first brand has made waves in the running world. Can the shoe actually keep up?
